pullrequest.title: Fixed a typo in logging failures in the queue.

content.raw:
Wow! This bug has existed for over 3 years! The line of code was introduced in [this](#!/labscript_suite/blacs/src/93cb221dd440/main.pyw?at=gtk#cl-539) commit in an early version of GTK BLACS! It looks like I noticed something was wrong when I ported it to Qt, but still didn't add the required `%s`. 

I guess people don't often abort during transition to buffered!
content.html:
Wow! This bug has existed for over 3 years! The line of code was introduced in this commit in an early version of GTK BLACS! It looks like I noticed something was wrong when I ported it to Qt, but still didn't add the required %s.

I guess people don't often abort during transition to buffered!
